metadata.title: How to create a test mode if a USB compliance test is to be run in host mode

sections.content:
Question:
I want to run a USB compliance test in host mode. In this case, how should I create a test mode?
Answer:
“USB Host and Peripheral Interface Driver” application note
Specify the “USB_CFG_COMPLIANCE” configuration setting or see applicable source code.
For example, you can see sample code for the RZ/A1H:
https://www.renesas.com/document/scd/rza1h-group-usb-host-human-interface-device-class-driver-hhid-rev100-sample-code?r=467676
The “USB_CFG_COMPLIANCE” specification will also be helpful for other devices.
Suitable Products
RZ family
